subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Eddy Curry was the best big man on the Amway Arena court Saturday, and the Knicks rode his dominance to a victory. He scored a game-high 27 points, 12 in the fourth quarter.
snippet: Eddy Curry was the best big man on the Amway Arena court Saturday, and the Knicks rode his dominance to a victory. He scored a game-high 27 points, 12 in the fourth quarter.
